means: 难以驾驭的，不受管束的

sentence.Network_en: The government has done nothing to ease restrictions and manufacturers are growing restive.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府未采取任何措施放松出口限制,因此国内制造商变得焦虑不安.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... restitution 归还 restive 倔强的 restively 倔强地.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... festive 欢乐的 restive 不安静的，不安宁的 exhaustive 彻底的，无遗漏的.
高口阅读词汇 - 豆丁网 ... propagandist 宣传员 restive 焦躁不安的 unification 统一,联合,一致.
SAT官方指南词汇记忆方法--第三篇... ... invective 侮辱的， rest－restive（ 难以驾驭的） （in 里面）＋.

list.abs: restive horse是什么意思沪江词库精选restive horse是什么意思、英语短语。restive horse怎么翻译: 难驯马相关短语: restive horse 难驯马.
yet I am of opinion , this defect arises chiefly from a perverse , restive disposition .但是我个人认为，这个缺憾最主要是来自他们刚愎，倔强的个性。
three people in a separate car bombing in restive northern city of Mosul ;, 另有三人在伊拉克北部城市摩苏尔的汽车炸弹袭击中丧生;
erstwhile friend China , struggling to keep a grip on its restive regions , has expressed " concern " .俄罗斯从前的友邦中国由于正努力控制自身的不稳定地区，仅仅表达了“关注”。
the prime minister's second achievement has been to tackle Spain's restive regions .他的第二个成就是成功解决了西班牙的动乱地区问题。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Old French restif, -ive, from Latin restare 'remain'. The original sense, 'inclined to remain still, inert', has undergone a reversal; the association with the refractory movements of a horse gave rise to the current sense 'fidgety, restless'

entry.tran: 不耐烦的;厌烦的;不满的
entry.def: If you are restive, you are impatient, bored, or dissatisfied.

means.word_mean: 2. impatient especially under restriction or delay;

sentences.sentence: "the government has done nothing to ease restrictions and manufacturers are growing restive"

auth_sentence.content: He turned restive at the least attempt at coercion.

auth_sentence.content: The Roundtable has been vaguely supportive but restive.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Roundtable has been vaguely supportive but restive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Roundtable has been vaguely supportive but restive.

auth_sentence.content: I became increasingly restive in my attic room.
